nodes.text: Traffic Control was an agency that directed traffic through the airspace of a city on many planets throughout the galaxy, including within the working force of the planet Kegan. Workers could be assigned to Traffic Control as part of their contribution to the General Good. Around 44 BBY, the planet had several starfighters, and its landspeeders, skyhoppers, and autohoppers were severely outdated.
The planet Bakura maintained a Traffic Control bureau headquartered at Salis D'aar Spaceport. It was responsible for regulating airspeeder routes through Salis D'aar.
